definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: A numerical study is reported on the flow over a backward-facing step.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究單邊放大臺階流的數值解。

sentences.english: Errors of "single channel quantized" correlators are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了單邊量化相關器的誤差。

sentences.english: Classic one-sided shrug. Translation: I’ve absolutely no confidence of what I just said.
sentences.chinese: 單邊聳肩的動作表示對自己剛纔說的話極不自信。

sentences.english: It can't be seen as intervening unilaterally in another Muslim nation.
sentences.chinese: 美國不能再以單邊姿態介入另外的穆斯林國家。

sentences.english: With an aim at some engineering structure features, a single-edge double-crack model is designed.
sentences.chinese: 針對某些工程結構特點，設計了單邊雙裂紋模型。

sentences.english: Thete are sovereign nations rejecting China's unilateral actions in their territorial waters.
sentences.chinese: 有好多國家反對中國在他們海域上的單邊行動。

sentences.english: I believe that unilateralism is too expensive and open dialogue is too slow.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲單邊主義代價太高，公開對話效率太低。

sentences.english: Third, it is the unilateral environmental measures that are taken to limit international trade.
sentences.chinese: 最後，環保例外權以限制貿易的單邊環境措施爲手段。

sentences.english: Sri Lankan rebels declare unilateral cease-fire.
sentences.chinese: 斯里蘭卡叛軍宣佈單邊停火。

sentences.english: Output is generated by an indirect synthesis technique that yields low single-sideband phase noise.
sentences.chinese: 輸出產生間接合成技術，產量低單邊帶相位噪聲。

sentences.english: A contract is either bilateral or unilateral.
sentences.chinese: 合同可以是雙邊的或單邊的。

sentences.english: So he started doing Criss-Crosses, Side Swings, Double and Multiple Unders in-between his sessions.
sentences.chinese: 所以他開始玩交叉跳，單邊，雙重，多重種類。

sentences.english: Seacrest Villa Phase IV full sea view flat with new and cozy decoration.
sentences.chinese: 浪翠四期低層兩房單邊全海景，簇新舒適裝修。

sentences.english: In the United States policy of unilateralism, Europe should also be bullied .
sentences.chinese: 在美國的單邊主義政策下，歐洲也要受氣。

sentences.english: The Turing test is a one-sided test.
sentences.chinese: 圖靈測試是一個單邊測試。

definition: (economics) to reduce/to curtail/to cut back/to tighten/austerity/tightening/crunch
to rise (i.e. number increases)/a price rise/to raise
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
variant of 掉頭|掉头[diao4 tou2]
